action.text: Referred to the House Committee on International Relations.

bill.summary:
Condemns: (1) the government of Iran's offer of assistance to Hamas, a known terrorist organization which controls the Palestinian Authority (PA), and its call for other Arab nations to do the same; and (2) the anti-Israeli and anti-American statements of Iran's leaders.
Expresses support for President George W. Bush, Secretary of State Condoleezza Rice, and the entire Administration for their efforts to deny assistance to any organization that supports the policy of Israel's destruction.
